   20: 
   21: -module(math_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: %% Test server specific exports
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   28: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   29: 
   30: %% Test cases
   31: -export([floor_ceil/1, error_info/1]).
   32: 
   33: 
   34: suite() ->
   35:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   36:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   37: 
   38: all() ->
   39:     [floor_ceil, error_info].
   40: 
   41: groups() ->
   42:     [].
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   48:     ok.
   49: 
   50: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: floor_ceil(_Config) ->
   64:     MinusZero = 0.0/(-1.0),
   65:     -43.0 = do_floor_ceil(-42.1),
   66:     -43.0 = do_floor_ceil(-42.7),
   67:     0.0 = do_floor_ceil(MinusZero),
   68:     10.0 = do_floor_ceil(10.1),
   69:     10.0 = do_floor_ceil(10.9),
   70: 
   71:     -533.0 = do_floor_ceil(-533.0),
   72:     453555.0 = do_floor_ceil(453555.0),
   73: 
   74:     -58.0 = do_floor_ceil(-58),
   75:     777.0 = do_floor_ceil(777),
   76: 
   77:     ok.
   78: 
   79: do_floor_ceil(Val) ->
   80:     Floor = math:floor(Val),
   81:     Ceil = math:ceil(Val),
   82: 
   83:     true = is_float(Floor),
   84:     true = is_float(Ceil),
   85: 
   86:     if
   87: 	Floor =:= Ceil ->
   88: 	    Floor;
   89: 	true ->
   90: 	    1.0 = Ceil - Floor,
   91: 	    Floor
   92:     end.
   93: 
   94: error_info(_Config) ->
   95:     L0 = [{acosh, [a]},
   96:           {acosh, [0.5]},
   97: 
   98:           {asinh, [a]},
   99: 
  100:           {atanh, [a]},
  101:           {atanh, [10]},
  102:           {atanh, [1]},
  103: 
  104:           {cosh, [a]},
  105:           {sinh, [a]},
  106:           {tanh, [a]},
  107: 
  108:           %% Trigonmetric functions.
  109:           {acos, [a]},
  110:           {acos, [999]},
  111: 
  112:           {asin, [a]},
  113:           {asin, [999]},
  114: 
  115:           {atan, [a]},
  116:           {atan2, [a, b],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  117: 
  118:           {cos, [a]},
  119:           {sin, [a]},
  120:           {tan, [a]},
  121: 
  122:           %% Logarithms.
  123: 
  124:           {log, [a]},
  125:           {log, [-1]},
  126: 
  127:           {log10, [a]},
  128:           {log10, [-1]},
  129: 
  130:           {log2, [a]},
  131:           {log2, [-1]},
  132: 
  133:           %% The others.
  134:           {ceil, [a]},
  135:           {erf, [a]},
  136:           {erfc, [a]},
  137:           {exp, [a]},
  138:           {floor, [a]},
  139: 
  140:           {fmod, [a, b],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  141:           {fmod, [a, 1]},
  142:           {fmod, [1, 0]},
  143: 
  144:           {pow, [a, b],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  145: 
  146:           {sqrt, [a]},
  147:           {sqrt, [-1]},
  148: 
  149:           %% Intentionally unexplained errors. It is difficult to explain
  150:           %% a range error in a sensible way because neither argument by itself
  151:           %% is guilty.
  152:           {pow, [2.0, 10000000], [unexplained]}
  153:          ],
  154:     L = ignore_undefined(L0),
  155:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(math, L).
  156: 
  157: ignore_undefined([H|T]) ->
  158:     Name = element(1, H),
  159:     Args = element(2, H),
  160:     try apply(math, Name, Args) of
  161:         _ ->
  162:             [H|ignore_undefined(T)]
  163:     catch
  164:         _:undef ->
  165:             %% This math BIF is not implemented on this platform.
  166:             %% Ignore it.
  167:             [{Name, length(Args)}|ignore_undefined(T)];
  168:         _:_ ->
  169:             [H|ignore_undefined(T)]
  170:     end;
  171: ignore_undefined([]) ->
  172:     [].
